content: sweet oddity art snap the alligator crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2023 of sweet oddity art you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 21 inches from bottom to top of head with weight 6 yarn and a 3 75 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the alligator and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #6 approximately 250g of main color and 100g of accent colors color a dark green color b light green hook size f hook or 3 75 mm 23 x 28 mm oval safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet sl= slip_stitch flo= front loops only treble_crochet= triple crochet double_crochet= double_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch bob= bobble stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head crocheted from top of head to bottom of tail with color a chain 5 1 increase in 2nd chain from hook 2 single_crochet inc3 in last chain working on the opposite side of the chain 3 single_crochet increase= 12 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 3 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 4 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 5 4 single_crochet bob x 2 20 single_crochet= 30 6 single_crochet in each st around stuff the head and body as you work 7 decrease 13 single_crochet x 2= 28 8 decrease 12 single_crochet x 2= 26 9 decrease 11 single_crochet x 2= 24 10-11 single_crochet in each st around 12 increase 11 single_crochet x 2= 26 13-14 single_crochet in each st around 15 increase 12 single_crochet x 2= 28 16-17 single_crochet in each st around 18 increase 13 single_crochet x 2= 30 19 single_crochet in each st around 20 4 single_crochet increase x 6= 36 21 5 single_crochet increase x 6= 42 22 6 single_crochet increase x 6= 48 place eyes between rounds 19 and 20 leaving 9 holes between them 1st eye is placed before the 2nd increase count 9 holes after the first eye and place the 2nd eye make sure you line the
